name: file-log
hubDesc: Append request and response data to a log file on disk
description: Append request and response data to a log file on disk.

fields.name: path
fields.help: The file path of the output log file. The plugin will create the file if it doesnâ€™t exist yet. Make sure Kong has write permissions to this file.

fields.name: reopen
fields.help: Introduced in Kong 0.10.2. Determines whether the log file is closed and reopened on every request. If the file is not reopened, and has been removed/rotated, the plugin will keep writing to the stale file descriptor, and hence lose information.
